name: Club COLLIDE
description:
Submission for Music Video (game) Jam #MVjam17

http://jams.gamejolt.io/musicvideogamejam2017

#ClubCOLLIDE is the hottest club this side of Galactic Sector ZZ9 Plural Z Alpha! This club has everything! Anti-grav dancefloor, giant retrovidscreen, robot-assisted jetpack-appliers and of course the sickest beats from across the sub-etha!

You are Marina, just a small asteroid girl looking for a fun night out on the town. Strap on your jetpack and dance around the floor, be sure to match the dances to make your new club friends happy.

Are you ready? It's time to COLLIDE!

Music: COLLIDE - from "Fanatiq Presents Jennifer Zhang in EMOCEAN"

https://soundcloud.com/jenniferzhangmusic/collide-...
